mapper.select: select count(*) from cet4 where cet4_id like CONCAT(#{CET},'%')

select
from cet4 where cet4_id like CONCAT(#{CET},'%') limit #{pageOffset},20
select cet4_id from cet4 where cet4_id like CONCAT(#{CET},'%') ORDER BY cet4_id DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: insert into cet4 (cet4_id, cet4_vocabulary, cet4_pronunciation, cet4_meaning) values (#{cet4Id,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{cet4Vocabulary,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cet4Pronunciation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cet4Meaning,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into cet4
cet4_id,
cet4_vocabulary,
cet4_pronunciation,
cet4_meaning,
#{cet4Id,jdbcType=CHAR},
#{cet4Vocabulary,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{cet4Pronunciation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{cet4Meaning,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update cet4
cet4_vocabulary = #{cet4Vocabulary,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cet4_pronunciation = #{cet4Pronunciation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cet4_meaning = #{cet4Meaning,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where cet4_id = #{cet4Id,jdbcType=CHAR}
